mapper.select:
select vr.viproom_id,vr.viproom_name,vr.active_state,ap.airport_name,ap.header_name,ap.header_phone from sys_viproom vr,sys_airport ap where vr.airport_id = ap.airport_id and vr.dtflag=0 and ap.state=0 and ap.dtflag=0
and concat(vr.viproom_name,ap.airport_name) like CONCAT('%','${searchContent}','%' )
and vr.active_state = #{viproomState}
order by vr.create_time desc
mapper.update: update sys_viproom set dtflag = 1 where viproom_id = #{viproomId}
update sys_viproom set active_state = 0 where viproom_id = #{viproomId}
update sys_viproom set active_state = 1 where viproom_id = #{viproomId}
mapper.sql: viproom_id, airport_id, viproom_name, singleconsume_money, room_num, open_time, end_time, longitude, province, city, country, address, remark1, dtflag
mapper.select: select vr.viproom_id,vr.airport_id, vr.viproom_name,vr.singleconsume_money, vr.room_num, vr.open_time, vr.end_time, vr.longitude, vr.province, vr.city, vr.country, vr.address, vr.remark1, pe.click_url,pe.picture_id,pe.picture_url,pe.priority from sys_viproom vr LEFT JOIN app_picture pe ON vr.viproom_id=pe.viproom_id and pe.dtflag=0 where vr.viproom_id = #{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_viproom (viproom_id, airport_id, viproom_name, singleconsume_money, room_num, open_time, end_time, longitude, province, city, country, address, remark1, dtflag, Latitude,create_time ) values (#{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viproomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singleconsumeMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARBINARY},#{createTime} )

insert into sys_viproom
viproom_id,
airport_id,
viproom_name,
singleconsume_money,
room_num,
open_time,
end_time,
longitude,
province,
city,
country,
address,
remark1,
dtflag,
Latitude,

mapper.update:
update sys_viproom
airport_id = #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
viproom_name = #{viproomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
singleconsume_money = #{singleconsumeMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARBINARY},
create_time = #{createTime}
where viproom_id = #{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_viproom set airport_id = #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viproom_name = #{viproomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singleconsume_money = #{singleconsumeMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where viproom_id = #{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_viproom set airport_id = #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viproom_name = #{viproomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, singleconsume_money = #{singleconsumeMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where viproom_id = #{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
